issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Allow TableProviders to indicate their type for the information schema
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12132](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12132). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Improving on https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12106, we should allow TableProviders to indicate their "type" (base table, view, system table, etc).
